title: Manchester City revenue by stream 2018/19
summary: Overall Revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million euros is slightly increasing from 2016/17 to 2017/18, and finally roughly constant from 2017/18 to 2018/19.
Maximum Revenue in million euros, about 265.7 was reported at Year 2017/18
The lowest Revenue in million euros, of value 230.5 was reported at Year 2016/17
min_summary: In general Revenue in million euros has rose over the Year.
